gods.name: Zeus

active_abilities.name: Lightning Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with lightning and stuns them for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

active_abilities.name: Olympian Thunder
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times with lightning. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease Attack Speed for 2 turns.

gods.description: King of the gods, master of lightning and thunder.

gods.name: Poseidon

active_abilities.name: Tidal Wave
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases its Attack Bar by 30% with a 50% chance.

active_abilities.name: Ocean's Fury
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Attack Speed for 2 turns. Damage increases by 20% for each debuff on the enemy.

gods.description: God of the seas, earthquakes, and horses.

gods.name: Hades

active_abilities.name: Soul Reaper
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and recovers HP by 30% of the damage dealt. Damage increases by 50% if the enemy is under harmful effects.

active_abilities.name: Underworld Chains
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies with chains from the underworld, disturbing HP recovery for 2 turns and stealing 20% of their Attack Bar.

gods.description: God of the underworld and the dead.

gods.name: Athena

active_abilities.name: Spear Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with a spear. Damage increases by 20% for each buff on yourself.

active_abilities.name: Aegis Protection
active_abilities.description: Grants a shield on all allies for 3 turns. Shield amount is proportional to 20% of Athena's MAX HP.

gods.description: Goddess of wisdom, warfare, and crafts.

gods.name: Apollo

active_abilities.name: Solar Arrow
active_abilities.description: Shoots a burning arrow at an enemy, dealing damage and inflicting Continuous Damage for 2 turns.

active_abilities.name: Healing Light
active_abilities.description: Recovers the HP of all allies by 25% and increases their Attack Power for 2 turns.

gods.description: God of the sun, music, poetry, and prophecy.

gods.name: Artemis

active_abilities.name: Hunter's Shot
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases its Defense for 2 turns. Always lands as a Critical Hit if the enemy's HP is below 50%.

active_abilities.name: Arrow Volley
active_abilities.description: Attacks random enemies 4 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease Attack Bar by 30%.

gods.description: Goddess of the hunt, wilderness, and the moon.

gods.name: Ares

active_abilities.name: Brutal Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with a 30% chance to attack again.

active_abilities.name: War Cry
active_abilities.description: Increases the Attack Power and Critical Rate of all allies for 2 turns.

gods.description: God of war and courage.

gods.name: Hermes

active_abilities.name: Swift Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy. Attack Speed increases by 10 for 2 turns if you get a Critical Hit.

active_abilities.name: Messenger's Blessing
active_abilities.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 30% and their Attack Speed for 2 turns.

gods.description: Messenger of the gods, god of trade and thieves.

gods.name: Odin

active_abilities.name: Gungnir Thrust
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with the legendary spear. This attack always lands as a Critical Hit and ignores Defense.

active_abilities.name: Raven's Wisdom
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies and brands them for 2 turns. Branded enemies receive 25% increased damage.

gods.description: The All-Father, god of wisdom, war, and death.

gods.name: Thor

active_abilities.name: Hammer Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with Mjolnir and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

active_abilities.name: Thunder Crash
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies with lightning, stunning them for 1 turn with a 60% chance. Damage is proportional to your MAX HP.

gods.description: God of thunder, wielder of Mjolnir.

gods.name: Freya

active_abilities.name: Charm Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and provokes them for 1 turn with a 75% chance.

active_abilities.name: Battle Blessing
active_abilities.description: Removes all harmful effects on all allies and grants immunity for 2 turns.

gods.description: Goddess of love, beauty, fertility, and war.

gods.name: Loki

active_abilities.name: Trick Attack
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and steals one beneficial effect. Damage increases by 30% per harmful effect on the enemy.

active_abilities.name: Chaos Field
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies and randomly applies 2 harmful effects for 2 turns (Defense Break, Attack Break, Glancing, or Slow).

gods.description: The trickster god, shapeshifter and master of lies.

gods.name: Baldur

active_abilities.name: Radiant Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with holy light. Recovers the HP of the ally with the lowest HP ratio by 15%.

active_abilities.name: Light Sanctuary
active_abilities.description: Creates a shield on all allies for 2 turns equal to 15% of Baldur's MAX HP and increases Defense for 2 turns.

gods.description: God of light, purity, beauty, and innocence.

gods.name: Tyr

active_abilities.name: Justice Blade
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases their Attack and Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance each.

active_abilities.name: Valor Charge
active_abilities.description: Charges at the enemy with the lowest HP, dealing damage proportional to your Defense. Gains Defense buff for 2 turns.

gods.description: God of war and justice, the one-handed god.

gods.name: Heimdall

active_abilities.name: Vigilant Strike
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy. Gains 50% increased Accuracy for your next turn.

gods.description: Guardian of the rainbow bridge Bifrost.

active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and freezes them for 1 turn with a 25% chance.

active_abilities.description: Increases all allies' Attack and Defense for 2 turns and heals them by 20%.

gods.description: Rice goddess, patron of agriculture and prosperity.

gods.name: Raijin

active_abilities.name: Thunder Drums
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies with thunder drums and decreases their Attack Bar by 20%.

active_abilities.name: Storm Calling
active_abilities.description: Summons lightning storms that stun all enemies for 1 turn with 40% chance.

gods.description: Thunder god, drumbeater of storms.

gods.name: Fujin

active_abilities.name: Wind Bag
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and increases your Attack Bar by 25%.

active_abilities.name: Tornado Creation
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies with wind and applies slow for 2 turns.

gods.description: Wind god, master of air currents.

gods.name: Benzaiten

active_abilities.name: Flowing Music
active_abilities.description: Heals all allies by 30% and increases their Attack Bar by 15%.

active_abilities.name: Knowledge Stream
active_abilities.description: Grants all allies immunity for 1 turn and increases their Critical Rate for 2 turns.

gods.description: Goddess of music, eloquence, and flowing water.

gods.name: Hachiman

active_abilities.name: Divine Archery
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with a guaranteed critical hit and applies Defense break for 2 turns.

active_abilities.name: Battle Strategy
active_abilities.description: Increases all allies' Attack and Critical Rate for 2 turns.

gods.description: God of war and divine protection.

gods.name: Jizo

active_abilities.name: Protection Ward
active_abilities.description: Grants a shield to all allies for 3 turns and cleanses harmful effects.

active_abilities.name: Compassionate Aid
active_abilities.description: Heals all allies by 40% and grants immunity for 1 turn.

gods.description: Protector of travelers and children.

gods.name: Tengu

active_abilities.name: Sword Training
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times with increased critical rate.

active_abilities.name: Wind Flight
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies and increases your Speed for 3 turns.

gods.description: Mountain spirit, master of martial arts.

gods.name: Marduk

active_abilities.name: Dragon Slayer
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with massive force, ignoring 50% of their defense. Always lands as a Critical Hit.

active_abilities.name: Cosmic Order
active_abilities.description: Restores order to the battlefield, cleansing all allies and applying 3 random debuffs to all enemies.

gods.description: King of gods, slayer of Tiamat and bringer of cosmic order.

gods.name: Tiamat

active_abilities.name: Primordial Chaos
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Max HP by 15% for the battle.

active_abilities.name: Spawn Monsters
active_abilities.description: Summons chaotic minions that attack random enemies 5 times.

gods.description: Primordial goddess of chaos and salt water, mother of monsters.

gods.name: Enlil

active_abilities.name: Divine Wind
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies with divine wind and increases all allies' Speed for 2 turns.

active_abilities.name: Storm Bringer
active_abilities.description: Brings storms that stun all enemies for 1 turn and decrease their Attack Bar by 30%.

gods.description: Lord of air and earth, controller of storms.

gods.name: Ereshkigal

active_abilities.name: Death Gaze
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts brand and continuous damage for 3 turns.

active_abilities.name: Underworld Dominion
active_abilities.description: Claims dominion over all enemies, applying oblivion and heal block for 2 turns.

gods.description: Queen of the underworld, ruler of the dead.

gods.name: Shamash

active_abilities.name: Solar Justice
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy with solar light and removes all beneficial effects.

active_abilities.name: Law Codex
active_abilities.description: Enforces divine law, granting all allies immunity and attack buff for 2 turns.

gods.description: Sun god of justice and law.

gods.name: Ishtar

active_abilities.name: Love and War
active_abilities.description: Attacks an enemy and applies random buff to allies or random debuff to enemies.

active_abilities.name: Descent and Return
active_abilities.description: Revives all fallen allies with 50% HP and grants them attack buff.

gods.description: Goddess of love, beauty, and warfare.

gods.name: Nergal

active_abilities.name: Plague Bringer
active_abilities.description: Attacks all enemies and applies continuous damage for 3 turns.

active_abilities.name: War Frenzy
active_abilities.description: Grants all allies attack buff and counter-attack for 2 turns.

gods.description: God of war, plague, and the underworld.

gods.name: Ninlil

active_abilities.name: Grain Blessing
active_abilities.description: Heals all allies by 35% and grants them continuous recovery for 3 turns.

active_abilities.name: Earth Nurture
active_abilities.description: Increases all allies' Defense for 3 turns and provides shields.

gods.description: Goddess of grain and the wind.
